name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Quality Engineer with 10+ years of experience focused on **Automation Testing**, **CI/CD**, and **Process Improvement**. Demonstrated expertise in **QA Methodologies** and leveraging **AI-driven Testing Tools** to enhance testing efficiency and accuracy. Proficient in **C#** for developing and implementing automated testing frameworks, and experienced in low-code testing environments that accelerate delivery timelines.  Proven ability to improve processes and deliver collaborative support across cross-functional teams.

Additionally, brings strong background in **Full Stack Development** with hands-on skills in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and a deep understanding of full stack technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS** and skilled in **microservices architecture**. Committed to building secure, maintainable, and compliant solutions while driving real-world impact.
